mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE( T1.USER_SEQ, 0 ) AS USER_SEQ FROM ( SELECT COUNT(1), USER_SEQ FROM TB_USER_MNG WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND USER_PWD = #{userPwd} ) T1

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.BUCKET_SEQ DESC) AS RN, A.BUCKET_SEQ, A.USER_SEQ, A.BUCKET_NM, A.BUCKET_DSCR, A.REP_IMG_URL, A.REG_DTTM, A.DEL_YN, A.SUCCESS_YN, (CASE WHEN Count(*) OVER() > ( #{stNo} + #{searchCnt} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS MORE_YN FROM TB_BUCKET_MNG A INNER JOIN TB_BOOKMARK B ON A.BUCKET_SEQ = B.BUCKET_SEQ WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND A.USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} ORDER BY B.REG_DTTM DESC LIMIT #{stNo}, #{searchCnt}

SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.STORY_SEQ DESC) AS RN, A.STORY_SEQ, A.STORY_SEQ, A.BUCKET_SEQ, A.STORY_CONTENTS, A.IMG_URL, A.REG_DTTM, A.DEL_YN, CONCAT(C.USER_ID, '@', C.NICKNAME) AS FULL_NAME, (CASE WHEN Count(*) OVER() > ( #{stNo} + #{searchCnt} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS MORE_YN, (SELECT COUNT(T1.REPLY_NO) FROM TB_STORY_REPLY T1 WHERE T1.BUCKET_SEQ = A.BUCKET_SEQ AND T1.STORY_SEQ = A.STORY_SEQ) AS REPLY_CNT FROM TB_STORY_MNG A LEFT JOIN TB_BUCKET_MNG B ON A.BUCKET_SEQ = B.BUCKET_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_USER_MNG C ON B.USER_SEQ = C.USER_SEQ WHERE A.BUCKET_SEQ = #{bucketSeq} LIMIT #{stNo}, #{searchCnt}

SELECT USER_SEQ, USER_ID, USER_PWD, PROFILE_URL, INTRO_DESC, REG_DTTM, DEL_YN, (CASE WHEN Count(*) OVER() > ( #{stNo} + #{searchCnt} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS MORE_YN FROM TB_USER_MNG WHERE USER_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{searchText},'%') AND DEL_YN = 'N' LIMIT #{stNo}, #{searchCnt}
SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ DESC) AS RN, REP_IMG_URL FROM TB_SUGGEST_BUCKET_MNG

SELECT SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ, SUGGEST_BUCKET_GROUP, SUGGEST_BUCKET_NM, SCRAP_CNT, REP_IMG_URL FROM TB_SUGGEST_BUCKET_MNG WHERE SUGGEST_BUCKET_GROUP = '00' UNION ALL SELECT SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ, SUGGEST_BUCKET_GROUP, SUGGEST_BUCKET_NM, SCRAP_CNT, REP_IMG_URL FROM TB_SUGGEST_BUCKET_MNG WHERE SUGGEST_BUCKET_GROUP = '01' UNION ALL SELECT SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ, SUGGEST_BUCKET_GROUP, SUGGEST_BUCKET_NM, SCRAP_CNT, REP_IMG_URL FROM TB_SUGGEST_BUCKET_MNG WHERE SUGGEST_BUCKET_GROUP = '02' UNION ALL SELECT SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ, SUGGEST_BUCKET_GROUP, SUGGEST_BUCKET_NM, SCRAP_CNT, REP_IMG_URL FROM TB_SUGGEST_BUCKET_MNG WHERE SUGGEST_BUCKET_GROUP = '03'

SELECT SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ, SUGGEST_BUCKET_GROUP, SUGGEST_BUCKET_NM, SCRAP_CNT, REP_IMG_URL FROM TB_SUGGEST_BUCKET_MNG WHERE 1 = 1
AND SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ = #{suggestBucketSeq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BUCKET_MNG (BUCKET_SEQ, USER_SEQ, BUCKET_NM, BUCKET_DSCR, REP_IMG_URL, SUCCESS_YN, REG_DTTM, DEL_YN) VALUES (NEXTVAL(SEQ_BUCKET_MNG), '1', #{bucketNm}, '', #{repImgUrl}, 'N' now(), 'N')

INSERT INTO TB_STORY_MNG (STORY_SEQ, BUCKET_SEQ, STORY_CONTENTS, IMG_URL, REG_DTTM, DEL_YN) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.STORY_SEQ + 1), 0) FROM TB_STORY_MNG A WHERE A.BUCKET_SEQ = #{bucketSeq}), #{bucketSeq}, #{storyContents}, #{imgUrl}, NOW(), 'N');

INSERT INTO TB_SUGGEST_BUCKET_MNG (SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ, SUGGEST_BUCKET_GROUP, SUGGEST_BUCKET_NM, SCRAP_CNT, REP_IMG_URL) VALUES( NEXTVAL(SEQ_SUGGEST_BUCKET_MNG), #{suggestBucketGroup}, #{suggestBucketNm}, 0, #{repImgUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT A.BUCKET_NM, A.REP_IMG_URL, B.PROFILE_URL, B.USER_ID, B.USER_SEQ, B.NICKNAME, A.SUCCESS_YN, CONCAT(USER_ID, '@', NICKNAME) AS FULL_NAME, (CASE WHEN C.BUCKET_SEQ IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS ADDED_BOOKMARK_YN, (CASE WHEN D.TARGET_USER_SEQ IS NOT NULL THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS FOLLOW_YN FROM TB_BUCKET_MNG A INNER JOIN TB_USER_MNG B ON A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_BOOKMARK C ON A.BUCKET_SEQ = C.BUCKET_SEQ AND B.USER_SEQ = C.USER_SEQ LEFT JOIN TB_FOLLOW_MNG D ON A.USER_SEQ = D.TARGET_USER_SEQ WHERE A.BUCKET_SEQ = #{bucketSeq} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_BUCKET_MNG (BUCKET_SEQ, USER_SEQ, BUCKET_NM, BUCKET_DSCR, REP_IMG_URL, REG_DTTM, DEL_YN) SELECT NEXTVAL(SEQ_BUCKET_MNG), #{userSeq}, A.SUGGEST_BUCKET_NM, '', A.REP_IMG_URL, NOW(), 'N' FROM TB_SUGGEST_BUCKET_MNG A WHERE A.SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ = #{suggestBucketSeq}

INSERT INTO TB_SUGGEST_REPLY( SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ, REPLY_NO, REPLY_CONTENTS, USER_SEQ, DEL_YN, REG_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{suggestBucketSeq}, (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.REPLY_NO), 0) + 1 FROM TB_SUGGEST_REPLY A WHERE A.SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ = #{suggestBucketSeq}), #{replyContents}, #{userSeq}, 'N', NOW() );

INSERT INTO TB_STORY_REPLY (REPLY_NO, STORY_SEQ, BUCKET_SEQ, USER_SEQ, REPLY_CONTENTS, DEL_YN, REG_DTTM) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(A.REPLY_NO), 0) + 1 FROM TB_STORY_REPLY A WHERE A.STORY_SEQ = #{storySeq} AND A.BUCKET_SEQ = #{bucketSeq}), #{storySeq}, #{bucketSeq}, #{userSeq}, '테스트', 'N', NOW())
INSERT INTO TB_BOOKMARK ( USER_SEQ, BUCKET_SEQ, REG_DTTM ) VALUES ( #{userSeq}, #{bucketSeq}, NOW())
mapper.select: SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC) AS RN, (CASE WHEN Count(*) OVER() > ( #{stNo} + #{searchCnt} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS MORE_YN, REPLY_NO, USER_SEQ, REPLY_CONTENTS, DEL_YN, REG_DTTM FROM TB_STORY_REPLY WHERE BUCKET_SEQ = #{bucketSeq} AND STORY_SEQ = #{storySeq}

SELECT A.REPLY_NO, A.USER_SEQ, A.REPLY_CONTENTS, A.REG_DTTM, B.NICKNAME, B.PROFILE_URL, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY REPLY_NO DESC) AS RN, (CASE WHEN Count(*) OVER() > ( #{stNo} + #{searchCnt} ) THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END) AS MORE_YN FROM TB_SUGGEST_REPLY A LEFT JOIN TB_USER_MNG B ON A.USER_SEQ = B.USER_SEQ WHERE A.DEL_YN = 'N' AND SUGGEST_BUCKET_SEQ = #{suggestBucketSeq} ORDER BY RN

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_BUCKET_MNG WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}) AS BUCKET_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_BUCKET_MNG A INNER JOIN TB_STORY_MNG B ON A.BUCKET_SEQ = B.BUCKET_SEQ WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq}) AS STORY_CNT, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM TB_BUCKET_MNG WHERE USER_SEQ = #{userSeq} AND SUCCESS_YN = 'Y') AS SUCCESS_CNT FROM DUAL
